name: Luigi Fan's Custom Night
description:
Welcome to Luigi Fan's Custom Night. A UCN Modpack where different characters from different universes come as one to defeat the nightguard. From Doki Doki Literature Club, to Baldi's Basics, to FNaF, to many more. If you are ready then dive in.

This modpack was inspired by Axl and Nickbear's Custom Night and Kwy's Retarded Custom Night https://gamejolt.com/games/kwys_ucn_mod/431079  https://gamejolt.com/games/AUCNMP/405072

You need Texmod and UCN to run this modpack

https://www.fileplanet.com/archive/p-16225/Texmod-v0-9b
https://gamejolt.com/games/UltimateCN/349545
